name: KnowBe4 Product Demos
title: KnowBe4 Product Demos
body:
In the Product Demos tab of our KnowBe4 Community, we offer webinars on our KnowBe4 products. To view the product demos, follow the steps below:

  1. Log in to your KSAT console.
  2. Click the question mark icon at the top-right corner of the page. A drop-down menu will open.
  3. Click on Product Demos. You will be redirected to the KnowBe4 Community page.

    Note:If this is your first time accessing the community, you'll need to register your account and accept the Terms of Use. For more information, see our KnowBe4 Community Guide.
  4. Click on Product Demos in the navigation bar at the top of the page.

  5. Click the subtab for a product and select your language from the drop-down menu.

    Note:Demos are available for all products and are available in multiple languages.
  6. Select an option to open the product demo video.

By viewing our product demos, you’ll be better equipped to strengthen your human firewall by enabling your users to make smarter security decisions.

For additional resources, see the list below:

  • KnowBe4 Console Quickstart Implementation Guide
  • Whitelisting Guide
  • Phish Alert Button (PAB) Product Manual
  • Active Directory Integration (ADI) Configuration Guide
  • SCIM Configuration Guide
  • Create and Edit Email Templates and Landing Pages
  • Create and Manage Phishing Campaigns
  • Training Campaigns Guide

images.alt:
This image displays a four-item contextual dropdown menu, likely accessed from a help or support icon (indicated by the visible blue question mark icon above the menu).

**Menu Contents (Top to Bottom):**

1.  **Contact Support:** Accompanied by a headset icon.
2.  **Knowledge Base:** Accompanied by a document/book icon.
3.  **Product Demos:** Accompanied by a play button icon.
4.  **Status Page:** Accompanied by a warning/exclamation mark icon.

**Focus Element:**

A solid orange arrow is overlaid on the image, pointing specifically to the third menu option, **"Product Demos."**
images.context: irected to the KnowBe4 Community page.

images.alt:
This image displays a horizontal UI navigation bar, likely the header component of a community web portal.

**Elements (Left to Right):**

1.  **Branding and Context:** The logo "KnowBe4" (orange text, circular icon within the 'o') is displayed on the left, followed by the section title "Community," separated by a vertical line.
2.  **Primary Navigation Menu:** A series of text links provides navigation options:
    *   "Explore" (includes a dropdown chevron indicator).
    *   "Knowledge Base"
    *   "Ideas"
    *   "News"
    *   "Product Demos" (This link is highlighted with an orange rectangular border, indicating the current active page or focus state).
    *   "Events"
3.  **Utility Icons:** Two circular icons are present:
    *   A search icon (magnifying glass).
    *   A notification icon (bell).
4.  **Call-to-Action (CTA):** A prominent, solid orange, pill-shaped button is located on the far right, labeled **"+ Create Post."**
images.context: ng>Product Demos in the navigation bar at the top of the page.

images.alt:
This image displays a section of a web interface categorized as "Product Demos," utilizing a clear content filtering and grid system.

**Header and Context:**
An orange persistent header bar contains a user-generated or system notification: "Looking for ideas around utilizing Deepfake Phishing in campaigns T 5 days ago." The main page title is centered and reads "Product Demos."

**Navigation and Filtering:**
A primary horizontal navigation bar allows filtering by product category. The current selection is "All" (indicated by an underline). Other available filters include: "KnowBe4 Security Awareness Training (KSAT)," "AIDA," "SecurityCoach," "PhishER," "Defend," and "Prevent."
A secondary dropdown filter is visible below the navigation, labeled "All languages (23)."

**Content Display (Demo Cards):**
The primary content is presented in a three-column grid of white content cards, each featuring:

1.  **Product Icon:** A distinct orange graphic associated with the content.
2.  **Title:** A multi-line descriptive title.
3.  **Language Tag:** An orange-background badge specifying the language.
4.  **Call-to-Action (CTA):** A "Watch" link followed by a play icon.

**Visible Content Examples (Top Row):**

*   **Card 1 (AIDA):** Icon of a lightbulb/training cap; Title: "AIDA Onboarding Webinar"; Tag: "ENGLISH."
*   **Card 2 (Defend):** Icon of an ‘X’ inside a circle; Title: "Defend Onboarding Webinar"; Tag: "ENGLISH."
*   **Card 3 (KSAT/General):** Icon of a circular arrow; Title (French): "KnowBe4 Formation de sensibilisation à la sécurité Webinaire d'intégration"; Tag: "FRENCH."

The partial view of the bottom row indicates additional content in "GERMAN," "ENGLISH," and "FRENCH" languages.
images.context: >Click the subtab for a product and select your language from the drop-down menu.
